message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to start the negotiations at $2,000,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $2,000,000 price point. I would like to propose a price of $1,800,000.

Bob, I appreciate you coming up on the price.  While $2,000,000 represents the high-end value for this product, I understand your constraints. To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Given my budget, I would like to propose a price of $1,500,000.
